    @pytest.mark.parametrize(
        'publish_app, publish_mod',
        [
            (DouyinPublishApp, Const.PUBLISH_TIMING),
            (DouyinPublishApp, Const.PUBLISH_NOW),
    
            (WechatPublishApp, Const.PUBLISH_TIMING),
            (WechatPublishApp, Const.PUBLISH_NOW),
    
            (XiaohongshuPublishApp, Const.PUBLISH_TIMING),
            (XiaohongshuPublishApp, Const.PUBLISH_NOW),
        ],
        ids=[
            'douyin_timing', 'douyin_now',
            'wechat_timing', 'wechat_now',
            'xiaohongshu_timing', 'xiaohongshu_now'])
    def test_publish2douyin(test_output_dir, publish_app, publish_mod):
        """
        测试定时发布、立即发布
        """
        # 因为要用到 config.ini 所以没用到 test_output_dir
        work_dir = os.path.join(test_output_dir, curr_func_name())
        source_config_dir = os.path.join(curr_dir, 'config')
        with FileUtil.copy_file_context([source_config_dir], work_dir):
            config_path = os.path.join(
                work_dir, 'config', 'config.ini')
            set_config(config_path=config_path,
                       settings={
                           ('publish', 'publish_mod'): publish_mod,
                           ('publish', 'media_type'): Const.MEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO
                       })

    async def async_publish(self, upload_filepath: str, pub_cfg: PublishConfig = None,
                            video_title: str = None, manual: bool = False):
        """
        处理发布过程
    
        :param upload_filepath: 发布的内容路径
        :param pub_cfg: 发布配置
                        如果为空则会读取 {self._work_path}/config/config.ini 下的发布配置
        :param video_title: 标题，默认视频文件名称作为标题
        :param manual: 是否是 console 提示的形式，提示手动输入发布配置
        """
    
        cookie_list = FileUtil.list_files_by_ext(
            find_path=self._cookie_dir, find_exts=[".json"])
        if not cookie_list:
            self._logger.warning('在 %s 下未找到 cookie', self._cookie_dir)
